info.name: Kick Back
info.attribution:
Room layout and scripting by Shobu and released to the Public Domain as CC0.

Library image generated using the MyNinja artificial intelligence image generator, https://myninja.ai/, using the following prompt: "2 trader fighting with bill, nasdaq, funny, old cartoon style"
info.description: Be the best trader and get rich!
info.ruleText:
On your turn either:
  - BUY an available share (worth its face value), available only from a column BOTTOM, and stock it in your personal area.

OR

  - SELL 2 shares of the same color from your personal area (worth their multiplied values, for example 5x4=$20). Every player starts round with $20, and has a "White 2" share, which is a wild and can be sold with ANY other share. When 3 columns are emptied, the round ends and each player has a possible final sale action. Play several rounds (alternate start player), and  compare collected money with your opponent.
info.helpText:
- Players take seats
- Click on deal button 
- On your turn, move bought share to your personal area OR move your 2 sold shares to the discard pile. Then update your $$$ counter.
- When round ends, click on "Show $$$" to make both player's money visible
- Click on deal button to update cumulated scores and start another round
